column1: # Mapping from GLEAM feed codes to model entities
#   - gleam_code: GLEAM feed material code (from Tables 3.1 and 3.5)

column6: Hay or silage from grass (same as GRASSF for model)
Hay from adjacent areas (same as GRASSF)
Leaves from trees/forest (not modeled for now)
Barley and other cereals (using barley as representative)
Legume grains → dry pea as representative
Soybean meal → sunflower meal (model has this)
Cottonseed meal (not in model - skip for now)
Palm kernel cake (not in model - skip for now)
Dry grain byproducts (brans, middlings) → wheat bran
Wet grain byproducts (breweries) - not in model
Maize gluten meal (high protein) - not in model
Maize gluten feed (lower protein) - not in model
Sugar beet pulp - not in model
Calcium source for laying hens - not modeled
